name: Duality (itch) (Emotion Theory, nomand)
description:
Made in 48 hours for kiwijam 2019 with love by Adam Thompson (@EmotionTheory) and Alexey Botkov (@nomand)

A fighting game where two people are destined to engage in eternal conflict.

Two controllers recommended!

CONTROLS:

[ R ] / [ Back ] - Restart

Xbox:
[ A ] - Dash
[ X ] - Slash

PS4:
[ Square ] - Dash
[ Circle ] - Slash
